reviews.sentence: Nice. Cookies at front desk were very good. Coffee in the lobby store was great and no charge. Beds were fine pillows better than average. Five to ten min walk to movies aquarium and many great restaurants. Handy gated parking next to hotel nice short walk to lobby.

Nice. Cookies at front desk were very good. Coffee in the lobby store was great and no charge. Beds were fine pillows better than average. Five to ten min walk to movies aquarium and many great restaurants. Handy gated parking next to hotel nice short walk to lobby.

Great Acomodation. Very clean accommodations quit room great location at a good price. Loved the hotel the only complaint was the service in the lounge was slow to non existent. Had to get up and order most of the food and beverages ourselves. I would recommend this hotel to all.

Pop Lock and Drop. Friendly welcome and close walk to both childrens museum and downtown strip. Room was perfect for family and if you ask for an upgrade you have even more room on the top floors. The refreshed feel of a modern hotel in an older town is only reinforced by the sweet updated gym with decent weights. Will be coming back again for rooms service and parking.

Business pleasure. Excellent service and nice lobby but the rooms need an update. Stylish furnishings but shabby with chipped veneer on the wood furniture and marks on the walls. Just did not feel clean and new for the price even in a suite. On an earlier trip we stayed at the Hampton across the street which was newer. However the doubletree was very quiet a great breakfast and a service oriented staff.

Comfortable Up to Date Rooms. I was very pleased with the hotel from the time I checked in until I left. I was greeted by warm friendly staff and my room I selected online was ready and very comfortable. The lobby was very inviting and clean and warm chocolate chip cookies awaited. The bed was nice and comfortable and a big walk in shower. The hotel is in a great location for restaurants and close to the Aquarium and Chattanooga Lookout ballpark. If you are looking for a clean comfortable up to date hotel close to all the local attractions this is it. Without a doubt on my next trip to Chattanooga I will be staying here.

A great place to stay. The rooms staff and amenities at a great price. My visit was for business but the staff made me feel at home. The location is central to downtown Chattanooga with many great places to eat nearby. I recommend this hotel to any traveler.

Nice Hotel. The staff were very courteous professional and helpful. The room was clean and quiet and the bed was comfortable. I enjoyed my stay at this facility and would recommend it to anyone traveling in Chattanooga.

Great facility in a great location. Everything you had expect at a Doubletree comfortable accommodations great service good food options and a fair price. This hotel is in a great spot right in the midst of downtown Chattanooga. When I stayed there construction was happening nearby but it is all part of making Chattanooga an even better city overall. A bit of a hike from the Convention Center but not an unsafe walk. And not too far from the river and bridges that make for a nice run or stroll. I will definitely stay here again if in town in the future.

Friendly clean good amenities for the price. Overall good hotel with good amenities for the price. Room is usually clean and quiet other than rooms with an adjoining door. Great location for downtown activities good restaurant and bar. Easy parking friendly staff.

Small room and beds Great Location. This room is tiny as is the King bed and I am pretty sure it was a Queen. 2 elevators for the hotel had to service 13 floors and sometimes the wait was 10 minutes. It would open for the down journey and it was full from the upper floors. Elevator did not seem to queue for a down trip until is serviced upper floors so we just rode the elevator up so we could get to the first floor. Normally I would take the stairs but 7th floor with a 1 year old in a stroller and a 3 year old is not the time to be taking the stairs. Breakfast not included like it is across the street Hampton. Price was exactly the same but Hampton was fully booked. We had friends staying at that one so we spent time in their room. larger room but same size bed. Only a shower so we were not able to bathe the kids in a bathtub.

Friendly staff very clean slow elevators. Beautiful hotel in the heart of downtown. The staff was amazing and the room although small was very comfortable and clean. The valet service and front desk staff were very excellent and helpful. My wife ended up getting sick during our stay and they gave us a robe and extra bottles of water for her. Only negatives were that the elevators took forever. there is only two and we never waited less than 5 minutes. We also requested extra towels for our room by phone and they never brought us any. We also requested a room with a bath tub but they could not accommodate us. Besides that everything was excellent.

Stayed here for a wedding weekend. Everything was great. Staff was acomodating and helpful. Even called us a shuttle 20 minutes before the service stopped running. The only downside was the hotel was crowded this weekend with a conference so getting an open elevator was almost impossible. but really no complaints.

Try another place same experience less price. The hotel is fine but very cold the only thing warm were the cookies which are really really good. The hotel has an Starbucks inside which can be handy for some customers. The rooms were clean and the beds comfortable but really nothing special or at least not too different from other hotels during the road trip which prices were much better with the same facilities. Paying 240 per night should be enough to have breakfast included in the price. The 21 for parking. it is also outregous as they have plenty of parking.

We were very disappointed with the over all quality of the Double Tree Hotel in Chattanooga. We have stayed in far better for less moneyThe area on the 3rd floor had a musky smell including both rooms. Both our rooms were located where we had a large AC unit just outside the window. You could hear the noise from the units all night long. Not good. For what ever reason both elevators were not working that Saturday when we came in. And only one elevator was working the morning we checked out. With everyoneguest checking out hotel workers ect using the one elevator it was not good at all.
Only 1 Elevator. The hotel only had 1 elevator in operation. There was usually a long wait for the elevator. We started taking the stairs to our 11th floor room after getting stuck in the elevator.
Only 1 Elevator. The hotel only had 1 elevator in operation. There was usually a long wait for the elevator. We started taking the stairs to our 11th floor room after getting stuck in the elevator.

Positives convenient location to restaurants and aquarium. Mini fridge. Free cookie at check in. Negatives 1 elevator working today and hotel employees ridding the elevator to go from 5th to 6th floor 2nd to 3rd etc while guests wait for elevator 8 mins. Brown grout in the shower just to find out that there is BLACK mold covering the shower corners. disgusting. Lastly maintainance to the building painting the exterior wals without caring for posibe spray paint getting on the vehicles in the parking lot. So far Not a good experience.

Had a great time. Would recommend. The location was great and the staff was awesome. Once they finish their renovation and get the other elevator working it ’l be awesome. Only one working elevator. So between the guest and staff all using one lift it made for some long wait times when going up.
